text: "Let's Groove" is a 1981 song from the R&B; act Earth, Wind & Fire. It is on their album Raise!. The song was one of the band's biggest hits. It peaked at #3 in the United States and the United Kingdom. The song was number one on the Hot Soul Singles chart for eight weeks. It was certified platinum by the RIAA for sales of over one million copies. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Earth, Wind & Fire songs Category:Melanie C songs Category:CDB (band) songs
